column1: TEST3  Put my vacuum cleaner back in the garage please.
TEST4  He has to make a choice between ice cream, coffee, and fries.
TEST5  Without the data set, the article about chicken is basically useless.
TEST6  Two of the four judges dropped all charges, and Holly was free.
TEST7  Head over to any shopping mall and buy three cheeseburgers.
TEST8  I forgot to add sugar: how could this happen?
TEST9  Adam’s three favorite drinks are tea, Coca Cola, and soy milk.
TEST10  Whenever I go to get in the bath, I measure the temperature.
